content:
Would anyone like to volunteer to take a look at https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/1526 for merging? I think it'd be pretty good to get in sooner rather than later so the arm64 backend can track progress by uncommenting/enabling tests

Add AArch64 tests to CI by alexcrichton 路 Pull Request #1526 路 bytecodealliance/wasmtime
This commit enhances our CI with an AArch64 builder. Currently we have no physical hardware to run on so for now we run all tests in an emulator. The AArch64 build is cross-compiled from x86_64 fro...
@Alex Crichton I'll take a look at this
